1085600.name: Fantasy Grounds - Stone and a Hard Place Figure Flats (Token Pack)
1085600.description:
Stone and a Hard Place Figure Flats

Stone and a Hard Place Figure Flats give you play miniatures in our usual style for all the important characters, critters, and villains in
Stone and a Hard Placeby three-time Hugo Award-winning colorist Cheyenne Wright!
This product includes in pog and token styles:
  • Agent Female
  • Agent Male
  • Black Rider
  • Bloodwire man
  • Coot Jenkins
  • Dead AI
  • 2 Dead Gungirls
  • 2 Dead Gunmans
  • Dessicated Dead
  • Doom Locust
  • 2 El Diablos
  • Feral Camel
  • Giant Scorpion
  • Glom
  • Hexgirl
  • Mr Collins
  • 2 Navajo Males
  • Old Stone
  • Outlaw Girl
  • 2 Outlaw Guys
  • Padre Diaz
  • Ranger
  • Rock Devil
  • Ronan Lynch
  • Stone Crow
  • Stone
  • Th' Dawg
  • The Cackler
  • Tlchtga
  • Virgil Earp
  • Wyatt Earp
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Scott Geeding
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
